plugins.name: delve
plugins.description: Use when the user wants to debug a program, set breakpoints, step through code, inspect variables, or trace a bug in a running process. Examples: 'debug this program', 'set a breakpoint at line 42', 'why is this crashing', 'step through this function', 'inspect variable x', 'run with the debugger'. Detects language automatically; uses delve-helper for Go projects.
